itemListElement.name: Good PizzZa Media Episode 108: Green Bodhi

@graph.name: GREEN BODHI
@graph.description: John Bayes, also known as Green Bodhi, is a prominent figure in the cannabis industry, particularly recognized for his expertise in cultivation and breeding of high-quality cannabis strains. Green Bodhi is the name of his cultivation brand, which emphasizes organic, sustainable growing practices and the creation of unique cannabis genetics. He is also known for his involvement in teaching advanced cultivation techniques, including organic methods, and promoting ethical, environmentally friendly practices in the cannabis industry. Bayes has gained a reputation for his dedication to producing cannabis with high terpene and cannabinoid profiles, and he's associated with the "Mindful Cultivation" approach, blending spiritual aspects (such as Buddhist principles) with his cultivation philosophy. This holistic and mindful approach has made him a respected name among cannabis connoisseurs.
